description.value:
Ratfolk/Mousefolk

Size. Your size is Small.

Nimble Escape. You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.GOU4UK5P4TINUGRW]{Nimble Escape}

Nimble. You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.FYGMXWAQU8ASR1KM]{Nimble}
